content.detailedDescription: About 1016pm took the dog out to the back yard, wich faces north. stopped tostar gaze for a few minutes becaause of the unusual clarity of stars here infla. as i looked away i saw an explosion in my peripheral vision. i looked backup and saw a bright light in the sky sitting there perfectly still like anairplane light for several seconds, then is just disapeared. i decided to keepan eye out for a few more seconds in case any thing else happened.  few secondslater i saw a pulsating light thatflashed quickly and appeared to be on a fastmoving object traveling at extreme high speed to the north these lights wew verydim as compared to the first light spotted also direction that pulsating lightscame from was directly were the first bright light was and quickwent out ofsightly. i used to have a 6 inch reflector telescope. this was not a naturalevent meteor for example. this happened in the flight path of of runways 36l and36r north of tampa international airport. but what i observed had nothing to dowith any commercial, private , or militry craft that i know of. i have a pilotslicense, and worked in naval aviation as an aviation firecontrol bombing radartechnition i also worked on radio communication, radio navigation, andelectronic warfare systems. i was a quqlified aircreman, and also launched andrecoveres aircrat on the the aircraft carrier john f.Kennedy for 1 year i haveseen ufos before, objects, not just lights that did cause em interfiernce, butnot this time, just the lights. there may be air crews from tampa that saw this,maybe evev one that might report it that is all
content.summary: Explosion in the sky over hudson,fl

content.detailedDescription: it was one morning around 400 am. sometime in either june or july of 1997.    my friend joe and i were sitting on my porch in hopewell va.. which at that    time i lived behind hardees off of miles ave. well, while we were sitting    there we noticed  a bright white light in the sky. so, we didnt really think    much of it. we just thought it was probly a search and rescue light from a    police helicopter because, it was moving slowly across the sky like a    helicopter would. about a min. goes by and then we were thinking maybe its    headlights on a plane but, the plane was travling pretty slow. about another    min. goes by then, we noticed something really odd as, it was getting    closer. the white light seemed to give off a shine to the ships underbelly.    it was then when we noticed that the ship was not a helicopter or a plane.    it was round just like a saucer. then the ship stoped. then white light on    the bottom of the ship started to change colors. from a white light to blue    ,then red, then white again. the light was changin these 3 colors and they    were picking up speed. then from a dead standstill the the ship darted off    in an up rightward slanted postion in the sky. it was one of the most    amazing things i have even seen in my life. the ship was gone in the blink    of an eye..Literally. my friend and i were in shock by what we had seen. we    discussed the event and realized we had just seen a flying saucer. it was a    few yr.S later that i realized somthing really even more odd about the whole    event. 1st 0ff the ship looked terran made man made. 2nd the lights were    changing to red, white, and blue. just like you would see as if an airplane    was flying through the sky at night. if you ask me in my opinion it was not    alien but, the us airforce and that when the ship darted off it left at,    what appeard to be some form of light travel or close to it. i would just be    happy to find out wether or not any airports in the surronding area had seen    anything on radar or not. if anyone feels free to investigate this for me i    would be really, really gratefull thank you for letting me get this off of    my chest. p.S. synful2u@hotmail.Com is my e-mail address for any questions    or ans
content.summary: My friend and i, saw a saucer move at light speed

content.detailedDescription: At approx. 848am on 8-8-04, i was in the backyard and noticed a small planeflying overhead to the north- northwest and happened to notice a circular objectfar above the small plane. it seemed to be larger or the same size as the smallplane, but i forget really. it appeared, at first thought, to be a hot airballoon, that was dull gray or dull silver, without the basket at the bottom. it appeared to be dime sized in the sky using your extended arm technique.  iasked my wife if she thought it was unusual, she said yes. im a privateinvestigator specializing in video surveillance on land, since 1992, but i haveno sky viewing experience.I got my digital camera within 30 seconds and was videotaping. my first frame isthe largest, after that, things are smaller. the video lasts for approx. 10minutes, i guess. my first frame is bright whitish-silver, which seemed like thesun reflecting off the ufo.   after about 20 minutes, 2 planes, several minutesapart, came from the nw, passing under the ufos, by my house and circled backtoward the nw and out of view.  the planes were detected as planes very quicklyby my camera.  the circular balls would get larger when zoomed in, but neverappeared anything like the planes.  there was not trail to the planes. the ufosvideotaped, were much larger and closer, when i first saw them without thecamera and the sun did not seem to be reflecting off the object.When i videotaped, they were no longer close.  i knew i couldnt tell how largethey really were or how far away. i tried to put telephone lines in theforeground for comparison, hoping that someone could figure out size anddistance and movement from my position and the position of the wires, andfactoring in that i was apparently swaying while recording.I was constantly trying to zoom in on them, but most times they disappeared uponzoom and the outline of a classical sauser spaceship, much larger than the ballwas videotaped.  this was probably just a  trick of light, i know.  since i wasconstantly zooming, i cant swear that the objects were moving or not.  my wifesays they moved from a triangle to a straight line and back again.  the photos ihave, were made by inputing the digital camera into a capture card on mycomputer and saving the film to an avi at 6 frames per second, uncompressed. itwas the best i could do. i still have the original.One photo, shows the jet crossing
content.summary: 3 ufos over los angeles

content.detailedDescription: We were in our van driving home. a passenger noticed it at first. we slowed downto relize the disk figure was not an airplane because it was hovering, still,and its shape was round. from the angle we looked at it we knew it was a diskshape, then as we drove slowly under it, the direction at which the lights werepointing changed and its figure turned into to a plane, but it didnt completelylook like a plane because its wings were more triangular and the body wasdifferent. when we first saw it we thought it was a plane.We were all excitedand wanted to stop and look, then we lossed sight of it when it moved slowlyforward and then disapeared in a flash.
content.summary: Saw disk with a pointed top

content.detailedDescription: Approx 430am i stepped out into my backyard to have a cigarette and i wasdrinking coffee.  i observed an object, a slim flying wing moving at a high rateof speed from south to north.  the object was white, had no exterior lights andmade no sound.  i would estimate the altitude somewhere around 2000 feet.  mydog did not have an adverse reaction, nor did i....I observed the object forapprox 5-6 seconds.  that is how long it took to move across the sky.  theweirdest thing i have ever seen
content.summary: Flying wing white in color, no lights, no sound

content.detailedDescription: Im an amateur astronomer and lifelong aviation buff and at approximately 135amsunday, 15th aug 2004, i had stepped out front of my house to check the cloudcover, seeing conditions and possibly some meteors. i also like attempting totrack satellites and orbiting booster rockets using my scopes electronic drive.The conditions had steadily been getting worse all night and because my scope issomewhat labor intensive to set up, i decided not to bring it out after glancingnorthwest and noticing a star flickering more than usual, typically a sure signof turbulence in the air and generally poor seeing, also the scattered cloudcover was quickly changing to broken while moving from wsw to ene.At that point, i noticed the star had some distinct red flashes mixed with somegreen and was quickly looking like one of the many commercial jets that overflythe area heading either n-s or s-n. i continued to watch, hoping itv
content.summary: Saw triangle with lights

content.detailedDescription: I was going for an early morning drive when something made me feel like i shouldpull over so i did. the car cut out the radio went dead and that song from theeighties came over the radio.... fade to gray then a huge light lit up in themiddle of a paddock just near the warby ranges near wangaratta. i could seesmall human like creatures walking around under the light. i felt a voice in mesay you can come with us now to a more beautiful place and i said icant i have alittle girl to think of and they said maybe another time.... nad theydisappeared the car started and the radio went back to the original station.
content.summary: Light in muddle of paddock radio and car went dead

content.detailedDescription: I saw a pin point object following closly behind a large commercial aircraft tothe south.  the object slowly pulled up next to the aircraft, briefly disappeardand reappered, then pulled infront of and to the side of the aircraft.  theaircraft soon after turned south and the object disapeared completely.  when theobject first disappeared and reappeared it was for about one second and wentinvisable to visable like turning off and on a light switch.  my first thoughtwas that it was being followed by a military jet, but compairing size, it wouldhave been the size of a small car, and no military craft i know is that small. the object and the aircraft were seen sse to south of my location in mt.Prospect, il, which would put it just north of ohare which is 5 miles south ofme.  i estimate the elevation of both objects to be between 7,000 and 11,000feet and proximity to each other was within 300 feet.  the commercial aircraftdid not seem to try to avoid the object.  it did bank to the south but it didnot seem out of the ordinary, only as if it was in a holding pattern, turning tomake an approach, or changing direction after reaching altitude towards itsdestination.
content.summary: Ufo following plane near ohare airport

content.detailedDescription: 1, i was on my way home from work at 1-130 am. driving down country road with agravel pit on one side, and forest on the other.2, in my headlights, i saw something in the clearing between the forest and theroad.3, at first i thought it was a deer, i slowed down in case it started to runinto the road. as i got closer, i noticed it was walking on two legs.My first thought at this point was that there was a car accident from up ahead,and this person was looking for help.4, at first i was confused, an animal or personas i approached and lowered my window,  at this point i realized that it was nota person or animal i got goosebumps which lasted for about 30 seconds.5, it stood as high as a toyota civic, it had a very thin body, covered in awhite or semi- transparent material. legs and arms very thin and long. the headwas slightly larger than a human, with black eyes, no nose, and a slit where themouth would be.It moved in an erratic manner as it entered the road, then it turned, saw me,and began walking toward my car with an almost spiderlike walk.When it got to within 5-7 feet on the drivers side, i got really spooked, anddrove away.6, i drove away, i kept thinking that there was a car accident ahead.There was nothing, and that is the time i realized that something really weirdwas happening.For the next week i had a hard time making a logical decision as to what i hadseen. i told my wife several days later, and she said that i had been actingdifferent.
content.summary: Strange person

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were outside to watch the meteor shower for a while. aftersome time of pointing out satellites and planets and such, we watched theskies... after about 15 minutes of watching my daughter exclaimed what the heckis that dad she was pointing straight up and i looked. i couildnt beleive myeyes what i saw was a boomerang shaped craft that was very difficult to reallymake out any features. it almost looked like a klingon bird of prey when it iscoming out of cloaked mode. it was like liquid, or smoke or something with adistinct v shape. i could see the stars through it, or what i beleive to havebeen the stars. they were discolored yellow though. as it passed, it was silentand flying steady and straight. after about 30 seconds i couldnt see it any morebecause it was so hard to see to begin with. im going to ask my daughter to drawthe shape of what she saw tonight and see if it looked the same to her. shedescribed it to my wife as a thousand little yellow dots all crammed together.
content.summary: Boomerang with klingon cloaking device

content.detailedDescription: Me and my wife were getting ready to go swimming in our pool when i looked tothe south and saw two amber orbs, they faded out very fast but i did see them weusually go swimming at night and always see something  when i seen them i knewthey were orbs i know the regular planes and satellites these were not them.Just the other night while in our pool we observed an orb traveling north tosouth right over us it was about the elevation of a plane and always after atime it60s light will fade out while it60s travling then just barely you can make it out, it60s very faint like a light light blue, we live in a rual area just outside ofkingman arizona.
content.summary: Amber orbs

content.detailedDescription: I first want to say that i have not told a lot of people this experiance. inaddition i had tried to do a search in my to find somebody to report this to,but the numbers turned out to be nis anymore. i found your site today andreported a sighting we just had 2 days ago and figured i may as well tell you myearliest experiance.I was 4or5 at the time and my brothermilen was about 7or8 so that would put theyear at 1978. we lived on taunton st.Sp in victoria, british columbia and ourmother wanted us to walk down to the end of our cauldesac and pay our babysitter his money. we had just gotten a new puppy and we took him with us aswell. it was dark outside as we left. as we approached the front of our yard atthe gate we noticed a large round disc that was a bright white color. i hadthought that perhaps it was the kids that lived behind us using a flashlight. itwas about 4 houses high 120 and followed us as we walked down the street. it wasat that time that i knew a flashlight couldnt shine that far. we reached ourbabysitters house and the object hovered over top. it was not visible from theporch and front door but could be seen from the front lawn. the mother answeredthe door and we told her that a light in the sky had follwed us to her house.She didnt react at all and went and got her son. we paid him his money and left.When we reached the sidewalk the object moved over us again. my brother freakedout and started running home faster than i could. i began to cry and panicbecause i couldnt keep up with him and the puppy was running slower than me. theobject stayed over me and not my brother. this scared me even more so and i wasyelling at our dog to please hurry up as i didnt want him to get hurt by them ortaken.We got inside and our mother immediatley began yelling us asking us where wewere. we had said we went up the street and ran right back because a light inthe sky was following us. she said that she called the baby sitter and was toldwe hadnt even been there yet. we had said that we were only gone a few minutesand that we had ran home  so we couldnt have been gone that long. our mom hadsaid that she was about to go out looking for us and call the police.We didntsay anymore because we were being yelled at. we then got ready for bed and thatwas the end of it.It wasnt until almost 8 months ago that i put 2 and 2 together. could we haveexperienced missing time  i have
content.summary: Childhood sighting wpossible missing time

content.detailedDescription: It was 1105 pm on sunday evening aug 8,2004 and my brother and i were walkinghome after returning a movie. as we were walking my brother stopped and pointedup and said,  hey look how bright that star is. i looked up and at first ithought it was the n.Star, but the intensity of its brightness grew. the objectat this time was stationary for approximately 5-6 seconds. the object then grewincreasingly dimmer to the point where it looked like a regular star. with theshift in the brightness the object appeared to get smaller as well could be haloeffect almost half the size. after it dimmed it was staionary for a few moreseconds then suddenly began to move se about the width of my pinky finger heldat arms length. at that point the object disappeared. we stood there for closeto two minutes afterwards to see if it would reappear but it did not. we wereboth calm during the sighting as well as after. we tried to deduct wether itcould have been a satellite they dont stay still, a shooting starthey dont staystill either, or saturn saturn doesnt just start moving then disappear. i thinkthat there may still be a logical explanation for it that we perhaps may haveover looked.
content.summary: Saw star-like object  over richmond, bc
Bright pulsating object in the night sky

content.detailedDescription: We were at a family get-together in loveland, co. we were outside looking at thesky because i told my family about the upcoming meteor shower to which we wereable to observe a couple of satellites flying overhead. i caught one and pointedit out to my 5 other family members outside with me. as we all looked at it, itgot really bright like someone pointing a spotlight into your eye. we were allstunned by this and very curious as to what it could have been. we all talkedabout how wierd it was but continued on with our night. this was at about 1100pm and lasted for about a minute. the object eventually faded out of sight. mybrother who previously worked at shreiver afb in colorado springs flyingsatellites, said he was pretty sure that wasnt a satellite reflecting the sunback. i just found it very strange and thought i would report it.
content.summary: Bright flash of light. not a satellite

content.detailedDescription: It was my morning routine to go out on my deck over looking the lake and have mymorning coffee. before exiting  the sliding glass doors i noticed a reflectionon the lake  just like if the moon was full thats when i looked up and saw whati thought was a large star but it seemed to be very low. my first instinct wasto get my camera but for some strange  reason i couldnt. i sat down and watchedit mezmerizesd. i was very aware of my surroundings but just really couldntfocus on anything else. i did look to the left and saw a 34 moon in the treesand also i think what was the north star, but this was nothing like that.While i was watching i thought to myself if this moves then i will really befrightened. then it slowly moved in my dierction over the house and it soundedlike a far away jet engine.When it left i sat there about 2 minutes in awe. my first instinct was to tellsomebody. nobody around at that time of the morning people were still sleeping. i went to the internet and looked up ufo and found this web page.Before this i didnt believe in ufos and im having a hard time thinking aboutanything else and i really dont understand why i didnt get up and takepictures.I also thought about reporting it to the police but was afraid of themnot believing me and looking ridiculous. i am willing to take a lie detectortest and to be hypnotized.I find myself hoping opssesively for it to come back or to find someone else whowitnessed the same thing or some explanation to what i saw.My only regret is that it was there for a long enough time that i could havetaken alot of pictures but the fact that i didnt will haunt me for the rest ofmy life.
content.summary: Lake maspenock sighting

content.detailedDescription: It was a very hot,humid,muggy night and i was lying on the livingroom couch withthe lights off and the central airconditioner running. i was facing the front,north-facing window and suddenly saw a bright, hot pink object descending slowlyat a steady pace. my first, gut reaction was, oh, theyre landing, immediatelyaccepting that it was a ufo. i was afraid to move off the couch in case itdisappeared while i was getting up, so i didnt go out to the front porch untilit was almost out of view. when i went out, the humidity struck me and i noticedthat there were haloes around the street lights, from the heat. the object wasclear and did not have a halo around it. while i was still inside, i had thestrong feeling that it wasnt making any sound and i didnt hear anything when iwent out. it was about the size of a car headlight, but i couldnt judge how faraway it was. i watched until it disappeared behind some trees. since lake huronwas directly north, about 1 mile from our house, i dont know if it disappearedover land or water. i was convinced at the time that it was an extraterrestrialcraft, but since then have been telling myself it couldnt have been, because idnever heard of one that was hot pink in colour. my main reason for contactingyou so many years later is to find out if anyone else saw it and if ufos doindeed come in that colour. unfortunately i didnt write it down, so no longer amsure if it was just after 1 am or 2am, but the date is definite.
content.summary: Hot pink ufo in sarnia, on.

content.detailedDescription: I was getting on to interstate 5 north bound and as soon as i was up to speedwith everone elce i noticed a bright light off to my left that was going over300 mph i saw it moving back and forth like a snake would,it was going nw towardsherwood.There is a hill it was heading for and it and about there witch is about 20 to25 miles away from me then it disappeared.I got off at the next exit witch is donald5caurora exit and headed east going to aurora. just before i hit town i saw ared light to my left north and as soon as i looked at it , it turned and shineda bright light at my truck and followed me for about a block, then the lightwent out and there was nothing there, by then i was realy freekedout.I was going to see a friend and was so shookup i was afraid to leavemy mother has seen the one over aurora alot, she was doing a newspaper route outthere for years and saw it all the time and thought it was a govermenthelocopter but i herd no noise just my tires and engine.
content.summary: Sky snake

content.detailedDescription: My sighting occurred sometime in the mid-8092s 1984 or 1985 when i was with two friends leaving a house in the quietvillage subdivision on the eastern end of nevada street just below helmanelementary school in ashland, oregon.  since this event occurred in the daysbefore the internet, i did not know how to report it, though i tried, and hadvery little information available to me about ufo sightings and reports.  mymemory of the event is somewhat sketchy now, with regard to date and time.  i amnot sketchy about what i saw.Ashland is a small town, with a population around 15,000 back then.  we were inthe ne area of town.  the two friends and i were teenagers at the time 17-19years old.  as we left the house heading to our car, one of the two friends andi glimpsed a brilliant blue ball of light traveling across the sky above us inthe distance to the east, low enough that it was below the horizon line of themountains.  we both saw it because i wasnt looking down at that moment andcalled out when i glimpsed it, and one friend looked in the correct directionwhile the other did not.  the ball itself was brilliant, even at that time ofday during the clear daylight.  at arms length, its size was about that of apenny, and it was between us and the mountain range, perhaps a mile away orless, but maybe a little more.  even at that time, i wasnt really sure exactlywhere it was in the sky with reference to us, because of the nature of its form,i guess.  it seemed close and low.  not far away like a plane in the sky - evena small one flying low - but also not so near as to worry us. it was travelingsw at a downward and slightly-arced angle, and at a moderate speed not ashooting star speed, not that of an airplane, either - slower, but not such thati perceived its movement as slow, either.  it was a moderate speed at first, andabout the time that it registered to me what i was seeing something not likeanything id seen or heard about as fact ever before, it immediately shot up atabout a 65-degree angle still sw very quickly - at a very high rate of speed -and disappeared from my view.  i remember being confused as to whether my viewof it was obscured behind a very large tree in the yard, or  whether the object93blinked out94 just before it passed behind the tree.  it didn92t reemerge in my view on the other side of the tree.The friend who saw stopped in amazement with me.  we both were incredulous andtrying to understand with each other what we92d seen, and the third friend who92d missed it all was wondering how he92d missed it.  i don92
content.summary: Brilliant blue ball of light low over ashland, or

content.detailedDescription: I observed a series of dim lights moving together in a straight line path movingat what appeared to be the same speed as most other commercial aircraft flyingat cruising altitude.  the lights moved from east to west over the period ofabout 1-2 minutes.  because they were so dim i lost track of them in the lightpollution over portland.  what intrigued me was that the set of 4-5 lights movedtogether in a straight line and then gradually change into a sort of echelonleft formation as they moved overhead so i knew it could not be one largeaircraft.  the lights were dim, but they did not appear to be like otheraircraft lights in that they had a dull glow around them instead of a brightcenter, or pinpoint light like most airdraft lights at high altitude.  the otherthing that appeared unusual was the closeness of the lights.  except for thechange in formation and its uniform appearance i could speculate that this mighthave been a meteor skimming the atmosphere or entering the atmosphere.  i mightspeculate it was a formation of military aircraft, but it appeared that theaircraft were very close.Well, i appreciate having the chance to report my data and i hope someone got abetter look at them.
content.summary: Group of lights moving west high over portland ore.

content.detailedDescription: We were inside the house and my wife looked out the window and noticed threeobjects flying in a triangular formation. she called me over to the window and,after i watched for a moment, i ran to get the video camera. my wife describesthe objects as shiny, silvery objects that looked dark most of the sightingbecause they were backlit by the sun.We originally were thinking the objects were balloons, but the one thing thatdidnt fit with this theory, was that the objects were in the triangularformation. balloons dont usually fly in formation.The objects were flying in a southerly somewhat westerly direction.By the time i got the video camera fired up, two of the objects were gone. mywife said they disappeared after going behind one of our trees. the videotape i  shot shows one object. the object presumably went behind the clouds and i lostsight of it.I have contacted the local mufon group and hope to get more weather detail forthe time of the sighting.
content.summary: Three floating objects in triangular formation

content.detailedDescription: Checking out stars watching for falling stars  movment thought it was anotherfalling star thought it was cool cause it changed direction                      glowing falling star yellow orange in color like heating up comming intoatmospere then flash to white refletive leveled out looked like high flyingsatalites i often see at nite this cause of changes i saw was not normal at alllost site as it moved into glow of the moon
content.summary: Metor changes course

content.detailedDescription: On sunday august 1st we were outside having a birthday party for my 3 year oldnephew, when suddenly a bright glare in the sky caught my attention. i toldeveryone around me to look up in the sky. the bright light moved at a slow rateof speed.Suddenly it took off little by little getting dimmer as it moved itmoved in a zig zag motion.The object . we lost sight becuase of the motion andrate of speed.
content.summary: Bright object spotted over southern california

content.detailedDescription: This is only a test, not a real reporting. sbcyahoo has now imposed restrictionson email it receives for its customers. it isnt allowing the wufod reports to besent due to the reports being sent from a pop3 email server on a dynamic ipaddress. most email servers use a static ip address this is a test to see ifchanges made allow the report to come threw now. this test was conducted bylouis inks, ast state director and chief investigator for the oklahoma chapterof mufon int under advisement of don weatherby, wufod administrator.End of test. no action is require by hq, unless this report doesnt make it backto the oklahoma mufon officers. susan hill, sd and myself are now using sbcyahoofor internet service and it is critical that we receive the sighting reportsfrom wufod so we may do our job. thanks
content.summary: Test only for oklahoma - regarding sbcs email rest

content.detailedDescription: We were watching planes fly over our house that evening we noticed an unusualsoundin a different part of the sky which drew our attention to the strange objectcomming towards us it appeared to be triangle shaped with aproxamatelyn 50 multicolored lights it appeared to have a symbol on the under side that consisted of2 half circles and a line down the middle we wacht with an extreme calmness andintrigue for approxamately 5 minutes as it made its way about 60 degrees acrossandtoward us until we lost sight of it behind some trees about 5 minuts after theufo passed over us and crossed the flight path of the landing air planes wenoticed the next plane that flew over was missing all of its wing and landinglights on the right side of the plane which we have never seen before.
content.summary: Cleveland sighting

content.detailedDescription: We were conducting training exercises in northern kuwait.  it was late at night,just after 11pm.  we had prepared out sleeping bags on the roof of our humvee. we were looking up at the stars.  i had gotten out my night vision, since youcan see almost twice as many stars.  we were at least 20 miles from anypopulated areas so visibility was very good.  i was looking through the nightvis when i noticed an object that seemed to be coming into the atmosphere.  itwas not a meteor, since its decent was slow and controlled in nature.  myobersvation is that this object was entering the atmosphere.  the objects lumincreased, and you could tell that it was getting hotter, almost like it wasflaming.  this kept up for a few minutes, then the glow started to lessen, as ifit were cooling off.  even after the object had completely cooled off, i couldview it in the night vision.  it was moving rather slow across the sky,obviously very high in alitude.  even though it was moving slow across the sky,i would say that its ground speed wouldve been that of a highspeed aircraft. the object seemed to be heading from the north, to the east.  i watched it forquite sometime before it became to dim to pick up in night vision.
content.summary: Object entering atmosphere in a slow, controlled d

content.detailedDescription: Wednesday, july 21st.  approximately 1000 pm. greenacres city, floridamy friends 11-year-old son and i were sitting out on my patio waiting for thepizza man.  my patio faces northnorthwest and i am quite familiar with the airtraffic from palm beach international airport.A light appeared in the sky.  it was blue and red and it was strobing very fast.It rose, dropped, and flew in a continuous, quick, bizarre half circle pattern,as if it was hanging from a pendulum that someone was dipping in the dky.  i raninside to get my friend and she saw it for a few seconds herself.  the entiresighting lasted only about 20 seconds, but it was impressive.
content.summary: Pendulum light near w. palm beach, fl

content.detailedDescription: Hellolong time night observer, familiar with night sky and all objects therein.Last night, 729, at my home in westcliffe colorado, while stepping outside tojust enjoy the evening, a bright spot caught my attention.  it was just belowthe constellation cassiopeia in the ne and was brighter than jupiter or venus attheir brightest.  i was surprised as neither should be there at this time andthis was a little bit too north for either.  then it intensified for 1-2 secondsand then faded quickly to almost nothing.  then i observed a low magnitudeobject  at that very point and then i noticed it moving south from that spot.I guesstimated that i was observing a satellite passing over head, somethingobserved often every night and for many years.  also, that the brightness mighthave been brilliance from reflecting the sun and then the angle changes,something i had noticed before.But this was different.  as it moved south, it accelerated  it moved at first,at the speed of a high flying aircraft or a satellite as observed from theground.  then it appeared to be moving, for a few degrees across the sky, thenfaster and faster until it was moving some 4-6 times any observed satellite ihad ever seen.  it stayed visible for about 5 seconds longer then i lost it inthe glow from the moon, which was in the sse.In all my years i had not seen this phenomenon.If you have any information on this, please share, e-mail or ask for my number.Noel bergewestcliffe colorado
content.summary: Bright object fades then accelerates away

content.detailedDescription: I was 16 at the time and i was hitch-hiking west bound on i 10 heading tocalifornia. sitting on my suitcase for hours by the side of the highway.Finally, around 10 pm, i could see the lights of a car in the distance headingtoward me. the sky was moonless and was extremely clear, the stars shone withincredible beauty. the vehicle pulled up after about ten minutes, it was a whiteford galaxy 500, 4 door. the man mid to late 20,s in age said., where are youheading i answered california. hop in, im going that way. after putting mysuitcase in the back seat i got in and we proceeded westbound on i 10. we drovefor no more than a minute or two when, rounding a curve we both saw and iexitedley yelled wow look at that do you see that off to our left in the sky,visible through his drivers side of the windshield were what i can only describeas sparklers you know the kind one would light on christmas or new years as achild and would blazen and throw off sparks all around while being waved aroundor in circles. well i was so exited, but never the less i noticed a crossing inthe median that continued into a dirt road on the other side of the highway andturned into a dirt road which led into the direction of the lights. these lightswere sow bright that they lit up the whole side of a mountain range includingthe dirt road. so i immediately yelled to the driver, stop, stop, go back, takethe di
content.summary: Saw silvery sparkes, taken underground by military

content.detailedDescription: Driving north on kennedy ave,movement in the sky,a balloon,i realised it was nota balloon when i saw it was flying aganist the wind,i tried to pull over butcould not due to traffic. it was silverwhite and flew from the nw to se,it flewin a straight line from nw to se.Lost sight as it flew south and i moved north.Iam an amateur astronomer and have seen many strange things at night, but nothinglike this durning the day. i am also a world war two reseacher and am constantlylooking up durning the day, looking for aircraft and at night watchingsatellites,stars, planets and meteorites. i have been doing this for 28 yearsand have identifed unknown objects many times before. such as military aircraftat night, fireballs, satellites,balloons.
content.summary: I saw a silver white disk
